comment.body: @Jetten: The Android app author and maintainer creates [an issue](https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet-kivy/issues/20) on github and asks for help about dropping kivy, it will be replaced if there is a better one, so I prefer not to waste time testing it
@Leftside: Thanks for the detailed explanation, 선생님(sonsaeng-nim) (sic) ^^

@Leftside: For some reasons Buddhists like to put stone sculptures everywhere and in Chinese it's 6 characters. I know there is a stone sculpture in one street that is written in different Chinese character. I searched it and found out it's from Tibetan Buddhism. So finally from wiki page \o/

> Kim was an extremely gifted child and had picked up reading ability at eight months of age. 

@Leftside: O_O I checked the wiki, so he was a Buddhist.. I doubt if it's true. Afaik quite some Buddhists like to speak and spread ridiculously amazing fakenews, if you agree..
@空澄砂夜: thanks for your opinion. "a single pane view on mobile and rely on the nav bar" should be enough

@Leftside: WuXia novels of Jin Yong are also an important memory of my generation! From books to tv shows, songs and games~ Jin Yong once was recruited as a history professor of a university. But it's said that, as commented by his students, his history lectures were full of mistakes XD
@Calmaquesse: nope, I have little experience about developing mobile app, but ZeroHello and ZeroMe mobile UI came from my pull requests to official repo ;)
@Leftside: I discusssed it with Nofish before. It's likely hard to solve without some big compromise and in low priority.
